text: A preface () or proem () is an introduction to a book or other literary work written by the author. == Related pages == * * * Abstract (legal) * Abstract (summary) * Epigraph * Exordium * Introduction * Postface * Preamble * Prologue == Footnotes == Category:Book terminology Category:Book design Category:Typesetting Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Preface
